Access to safe drinking water and sanitation is a human right, yet its limited realization throughout the world often has disproportionate impacts on the poor and on women and children in particular.

Access to water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) has been made universal through the massive deployment of urban water infrastructure as well as through decentralized smallscale water purification technology in remote areas, leading to widely improved health conditions and allowing a life of human dignity for all persons.
供水、環境衛生和個人衛生（WASH）已透過大規模建設城市供水基礎設施以及偏遠地區的分散式小規模淨水技術得以普及，使得衛生條件廣泛地改善，全人類都能有尊嚴的生活。

我們將在全球各地工廠放置全新的自助服務機⋯⋯
And everyone expects competitive prices.
每個人都希望能有具競爭力的價格。
And finally, the ability to speak comments with Dragon Notes (something no other PDF solution can offer).
並能使用 Dragon Notes 語音輸入筆記（其它 PDF 解決方案未能提供的功能）
And it all pays off in the end.
而這一切花費將在最終得到回報。
And our expertise is unique.
且我們具有獨有的專業知識。
And sometimes, it’s simply inside the heads of experienced staff.
甚至有些時候，資料儲存在有經驗的工作人員的腦袋中。
And thanks to them, we never stop growing and expanding our competence.
且因為這些客戶，我們持續不停地成長並擴展我們的競爭力。
And the language-specific transform files in the case of a multi-language setup package.
以及多語言安裝套裝程式中的指定語言轉換檔。
And the solution lies in modularity.
解決的方案就是模塊化。
And we can do it for you.
同樣地我們也能讓您成功。
And with easily-generated reports, you skip lengthy specifications with overlapping information.
簡便生成的報告，能省略具有重複資訊的冗長規格。
Andrew Maclennan Managing Director
總經理 Andrew Maclennan

EXAMPLE 2: The client has already Digifort surveillance and want to use the existing fixed cameras for four analytics licenses, then he must acquire the analytics base l and a pack of four analytics licenses (DGFAN1000V1 DGFAN1104V1 +), so he can run these licenses in any desired camera.

EXAMPLE 3: The client already have Digifort Professional surveillance with 32 cameras and will acquire more 4 cameras exclusive for video analysis.

HUTCHINSON General Purchase Conditions
HUTCHINSON General Purchase Conditions （HUTCHINSON 通用採購條款）
HUTCHINSON defines special characteristics based on the constraints identified on its own process and by also enforcing its Clients' product/process constraints.
HUTCHINSON 依據其自身加工和其客戶之產品/加工限制而定義特殊的性質。

HUTCHINSON expects its suppliers to conduct programs for operational excellence, whether organizational or technical for products or processes, to reach and maintain the best level of competition in their business sector.

It allows a particular photo from the video playback to be printed, with a description, date and time of the event.
能列印視訊播放中的特定照片，並附有事件說明、日期和時間。
It allows a text watermark to be added to exported images.
允許於匯出之圖像加上浮水印文字。
It allows a user to select a standard monitor to open the Media Player.
使用者能選擇開啟媒體播放器之標準監視器。
It allows adding a text watermark to exported images.
允許於匯出之圖像加上浮水印文字。
It allows adding a watermark per user for identification of image ownership.
能依使用者加入浮水印以辨識影像擁有權。
It allows all the screens from registered objects from the system's administration client to be exported in screen, and with this, the administrator may generate reports with the desired information.
允許從系統管理用戶端中已註冊物件的所有螢幕匯出至螢幕中，此功能使管理員能會生成具有所需資訊的報表。
It allows another map to be opened through a link, thus making it a map of levels.
能透過連結開啟另一個影像圖，而建立層級影像圖。
It allows audit records to be exported.
允許匯出審查記錄
It allows blocking access to the system after x attempts using an invalid password.
允許嘗試密碼無效 x 次後阻擋系統存取。
It allows blocking and terminating accounts of users imported from the Active Directory.
允許阻檔並終止由 Active Directory 匯入之使用者帳戶。
It allows concurrent operations such as recording, video playback, system configuration, live surveillance, event search, image search, server monitoring and several other tasks.
允許錄影、影像重播、系統設置、即時監控、事件搜尋、 圖片搜尋、伺服器監控和其他多種任務同時作業。
It allows configuring a standard directory to export media and photos from the surveillance client screen.
允許設置標準的目錄，用於從監控用戶端螢幕匯出媒體和照片。
It allows connections to multiple servers.
允許連接至多個伺服器。
It allows control through visual indicators (such as open door, turn light on, trigger siren).
能透過視覺化指標 (如開門、開燈、觸發警報) 控制。
It allows customized scheduling of days (Holidays, week-ends, important dates).
允許自訂排程日 (假日、週末、重要日期)。
It allows detection of audio level for alerts and events.
允許偵測音量以觸發警報和事件。
It allows e-mails to be sent through SMTP to make use of servers with SSL authentication.
允許透過 SMTP 使用伺服器 SSL 驗證發送電子郵件。
It allows fast-forwarding and rewinding the video to the next bookmark.
能夠快轉和倒退影像至下一個書籤。
It allows fast-forwarding and rewinding the video, frame by frame.
能夠格放快轉和倒退影像。
It allows filtering objects on the object list contained on the surveillance client screen.
允許於監視用戶端螢幕上篩選目標物件清單上所包含的物件。
It allows for an audio detection event if the level is above or below a preset limit for a specified length of time.
可使用音訊偵測事件，當音量高於或低於預設限制值超過指定的時間長度時起動。
It allows for video resizing during export in AVI to ensure better compatibility with existing codecs.
匯出 AVI 時可調整影像大小，以確保與現有的編碼器有更好的相容性。

It allows generating a communication failure event if the device remains out of operation for longer than X seconds, with the option of continue to issue the event at each X seconds while the device is off-line.
允許於裝置無法操作超過 X 秒時產生通訊故障事件，可選擇當裝置斷線時每 X 秒持續發出事件通知。
It allows images in JPEG, WMF, BMP, GIF and PNG.
支援 JPEG、WMF、BMP、GIF 和 PNG 等影像格式。
It allows importing any object from other Digifort servers with the purpose of streamlining the configuration of a new server.
允許從其它 Digifort 伺服器匯入任何物件以簡化新伺服器的設置。

It allows increasing the frame rate of a given surveillance camera, whenever it is selected (i.e.: normal surveillance at 4FPS, whenever the user selects the camera, increase to 30FPS, and upon being deselected, return the frame rate to 4FPS).
允許增加選定之監控攝影機的畫面播放速率 (即：一般監控 4 fps，當使用者選擇攝影機時增加為 30 FPS，取消選擇時回到畫面播放速率 4 FPS)。
It allows informing the information of the last user who moved the camera using PTZ.
允許通知最後一位使用 PTZ 移動攝影機的使用者資訊。
It allows limiting simultaneous access to cameras.
能限制同時存取攝影機。

It allows modifications in system objects, such as cameras, map, analytics configuration, LPR configuration, and screen styles, to be automatically reflected in the surveillance client, without the need to update the client.
允許修改系統物件，如攝影機、縱觀影像、分析設置、LPR 設置以及螢幕樣式，將會自動反映在監視用戶端上而無需更新用戶端。
It allows monitoring or the live or recorded images generated by the 360 degree panamorphic lenses, with controls in quad, virtual areas or virtual PTZ.
能監控或直播或錄製 360 度全景鏡頭產生之影像，並控制四格畫面、虛擬區域或虛擬 PTZ。
It allows operation via virtual matrix enabling the transmission of an image from one camera within a mosaic directly to the video wall.
可透過虛擬矩陣進行圖像傳輸操作，將分割畫面的其中一個攝影機畫面直接傳至電視牆。
It allows recording of redundant Databases.
允許錄製多餘的資料庫。
It allows remote operations to perform an emergency local recording, thus recording the images that are being monitored.
允許遠端操作執行緊急本機記錄，記錄正在監控的影像。
It allows saving a screenshot of the image on the mobile device.
允許在行動裝置上儲存圖像的螢幕截圖。
It allows searching and reproducing videos, via the bookmark, which are on the time line.
允許透過書籤搜尋和複製時間軸上的影像。
It allows searching by date and starting and ending times, in the audit system.
允許於審核系統中依日期以及開始和結束時間搜尋。
It allows searching the events database, through the event type, filtering by dates, objects and others, for internal and external occurrences to the software, related to system alarms.
允許透過事件種類、日期、物件和其它條件篩選搜尋資料庫，以取得軟體內部和外部事件之系統相關警報。
It allows searching, by the code of originality, an image generated in a report.
能依原始代碼搜尋報告中生成之圖像。
It allows sending via e-mail, reports on the server's operation.
允許透過電子郵件發送伺服器操作報告。
It allows sharing the same user base with all servers.
能在所有伺服器中共用使用者群組。
It allows system expansion by using additional licenses.
能透過額外授權擴充系統。
It allows that on the image analysis system, the objects being alarmed by any analytic rule have their outline changed to a particular color, for example, red.
允許將影像分析系統上任何解析規則中的警報物件輪廓變更為一個特定的顏色，例如紅色。
It allows the RTSP media server to be integrated with third-party systems.
允許 RTSP 媒體伺服器與第三方系統整合。
It allows the activation of alarms (Turn on Lamps, trigger siren, open and close gates, etc.)
允許啟動警報 (開燈、觸發警笛、開門和關門等)。
It allows the automatic creation of bookmarks whenever movement is detected.
允許於偵測到動作時自動建立書籤。
It allows the choice of how many frames per second to be used for computer screen recording.
可選擇電腦螢幕畫面錄製之每秒幀數。
It allows the configuration of Failover 1 to 1, 1 to N, and N to N.
允許設定 1 對 1、1 對 N 以及 N 對 N 組故障切換。
It allows the configuration of PTZ surveillance, manual or automatic, by the system's scheduling scheme.
能依系統之排程手動或自動設定 PTZ 監控。
It allows the configuration of an audio buffer with the purpose of offering continuous and crisp playback.
允許設定供連續和快速播放之音訊緩衝區。
It allows the configuration of independent schedules for each event of alarm input (cameras and I/O devices).
允許為警報輸入 (攝影機和輸/輸出設備) 的每個事件設定獨立的排程。
It allows the configuration of viewing by Resolution, Image Quality and Frames per Second (FPS).
允許設定檢視解析度、圖像品質和每秒幀數 (FPS)。
It allows the creation of public mosaics which may be shared with all system users.
允許建立公用馬賽克分割畫面以與系統中的所有使用者共用。
It allows the creation of various surveillance mosaics, each with its independent camera positioning configuration.
允許建立各種監控馬賽克分割畫面，每一種都具有其獨立的攝影機定位設定。
It allows the determination of PTZ control rights individually for each user, thus each camera shall feature PTZ control rights for different users and group of users.
可決定每位使用者之 PTZ 控制權，因此每台攝影機能針對不同的使用者和使用者群組提供 PTZ 控制權。
It allows the distribution of videos via multicast on demand.
允許透過多點傳送依需求發送影像。
It allows the dynamic update of mosaics on the surveillance client.
允許監視用戶端上的馬賽克動態更新
It allows the playback of audio and video synchronized in the proprietary format and AVI.
可透過特有格式和 AVI 同步播放音訊和視訊。
It allows the receipt of notification of movement detection from the cameras through HTTP calls.
可透過 HTTP 進行攝影機動作偵測通知。
It allows the recording to be carried out using a given video configuration and the surveillance to be done using a different configuration, through Video Profiles.
允許透過視訊設定檔功能使用指定視訊設置進行錄影，同時使用不同設置進行監控。
It allows the scheduling of one or more events for them to take place on any desired day of the month and year.
允許排定一個或多個事件於任何所需的年份和月份執行。
It allows the simultaneous viewing of recordings from more than one camera, through mosaics, thus allowing the reproduction of several cameras
允許透過馬賽克分割畫面同時從多台攝影機觀看錄影，從而能複製多台攝影機畫面。

It allows the simultaneous viewing of recordings from more than one camera, through mosaics, thus allowing the reproduction of several cameras concurrently, over the same length of time, easing the review and analysis of the recorded images.
允許透過馬賽克分割畫面同時從多台攝影機觀看錄影，從而能於相同的時間範圍內複製多台攝影機畫面，同時檢查並分析錄製之影像。
It allows the surveillance mosaic to be dynamically updated in real time when created, updated or erased at all the surveillance clients, without the need to reconnect to the server.
當建立、更新或消除時，允許監控馬賽克畫面即時動態更新於所有監控用戶端，。

It allows the use of a cell phone integrated to the system, as if it were a camera from the system itself, enabling the transmission of live images via 3G, 4G, or wi-fi, directly to the surveillance center as well as enabling these images to be automatically recorded on the CCTV system.
允許整合系統至手機中，於手機上操作如同系統本身攝影機畫面，透過 3g、 4g 或 wi-fi 直接與監控中心進行即時的圖像傳輸，以及設定圖像自動記錄在閉路電視系統上。
It allows the use of any image resolution.
支援任何圖像解析度。
It allows the use of presets.
允許使用預設設置。
It allows the user to choose the interval for skipping (X minutes) ahead or back on the recorded video, thus easing the analysis of the recorded video.
允許使用者選擇錄製之影像向前或向後跳轉之時間間隔 (X 分鐘)，以簡化錄製影像的分析。
It allows viewing cameras individually.
允許個別查看攝影機。
It allows viewing the image in full screen or in mosaics.
允許全螢幕或分割畫面查看圖像。
It allows you to easily trace product and design decisions back to strategy to ensure a lasting product foundation.
它能輕鬆地追蹤產品和設計決策以維持和策略同調，確保長久的產品基礎。
It allows, by triggering the alarm from a camera, a recording to start and/or the transmission of images from any other camera.
可由攝影機觸發警報以開始錄影或從其它任何攝影機傳輸圖像。

It allows, during the search for events by the surveillance client, that a video playback from the cameras linked to the event may reproduce a video from the cameras associated to that event, issued via alarm pop-ups.
以監視用戶端搜尋事件時，可從攝影機連結到該事件的視訊播放中，透過警報彈出式視窗重生攝影機中與事件相關的影像。
It allows, in a single surveillance client, video playback of unlimited cameras concurrently.
在單一監控用戶端中允許無限攝影機同時播放影像。
It allows, in a single surveillance client, video playback until 64 cameras concurrently.
在單一監控用戶端中允許最多 64 台攝影機同時播放影像。
It allows, upon double clicking on an audit record, for the latter to be expanded, showing all its details.
雙擊審核記錄可展開顯示所有詳細內容。
It allows, within the bookmark, the choice of titles, colors, start and end dates, and remarks on the events.
能於書籤中選擇事件標題、顏色、起始和結束日期以及標注。
It also allows performing statistical calculations for returns, deviations and average weights.
它也能進行統計以計算退回數、變異值和平均重量。
It also has 2.5 KB of SRAM and 1 KB of EEPROM (which can be read and written with the EEPROM library).
另外還有2.5 KB之SRAM和1 KB之EEPROM（可藉由EEPROM程式館讀取和寫入）。
It also has other implications for the behaviour of the board.
此外，電路板還有其它功能，
It also holds the technical solutions that comprise the product, specifications on modules, interfaces and the configuration rules for your products.
此軟體還具有包含了您的產品、模塊規格、接口和產品配置規則的技術解決方案。
It also provides the sensor fusion signals such as
它也提供以下感測器合成訊號
It also provides you with a status of any process that you have initiated.
同時提供您所發起之流程的狀態。
It also supports zoom via the mouse wheel.
也支援使用滑鼠滾輪進行縮放。
It automatic searches for cameras on the network via UPnP protocol.
透過 UPnP 協定自動搜尋網路上之攝影機。
It blocks access to the system after x invalid attempts
在 x 次無效嘗試之後會阻檔對系統的存取
It can also be used forcutting vinyl on large format flex faced signs.
也可用於切割大型塑膠看板。

當管理員啟用群組原則的登錄最佳化時，於 Windows XP 用戶端電腦上將會延遲，這種情況下將在第一次重新開機時，在事件日誌中看到如下所示的記錄，
It can be downloaded from Microsoft: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851 or can be found in Prerequisites folder on the Power PDF installation media.
可於 Microsoft 網站下載：http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851 或使用 Power PDF 安裝媒體中 Prerequisites 資料夾內的程式。
It can be time consuming to get to the right data, resulting in a lengthy and error-prone process.
取得正確的資料可能會很耗費時間，從而導致冗長而且容易出錯的程序。
It can group these pixels together to create tracked objects.
它能將這些像素組合成一個群組，建立追蹤的物體。
It can take several minutes.
可能需要幾分鐘。
It cannot workout that there are two objects there!
因此無法分辨出有兩個物體！
It captures analog cameras from DVRs integrated to the system.
能由 DVR 中擷取類比攝影機整合至系統中。
It carries over 200 integrated camera manufacturers.
相容超過 200 家攝影機製造商。
It communicates using the AVR109 protocol.
其使用 AVR109 協定進行通訊。

It contains everything needed to support the microcontroller; simply connect it to a computer with a USB cable or power it with a AC-to-DC adapter or battery to get started. The Leonardo ETH differs from the preceding Ethernet board in that the ATmega32u4 has built-in USB communication, eliminating the need for an external USB-to-serial converter.
支援微控制器所需組件皆已整合於電路板中；只需使用USB線連接至電腦或使用交流轉直流電源供應器供電或使用電池供電。Leonardo ETH與早期乙太網路擴充模組不同，其ATmega32u4具有內建USB通訊，無需使用外接USB至序列轉接器。
It corresponds to the (peripheral) hardware device that will be used to dump the lists.
它對應至 (週邊設備) 的硬體設備將會列於清單中，
It delivers a constant vacuum and is therefore suitable for use inavariety of applications on allAXYZ Series Routers.
可提供恆定真空，因此適用於所有 AXYZ 系列雕刻機之多樣化的應用。
It disconnects, optionally the operator, when his or her login time on the system has expired.
當超過系統的登錄時間時，操作人員可選擇切斷使用者之連線。
It displays information on the devices, such as cameras, sensors and relays, informing the device's status through visual indicators.
能在攝影機、感應器和中繼器等裝置上顯示資訊，透過視覺化指標顯示裝置的狀態。
It displays the name of the operator who is connected to the surveillance client
顯示連接到監控用戶端之操作人員的名稱
It displays the status of Consumer Bandwidth in Kbytes.
以 Kb 為單位顯示客戶的頻寬狀態。
It does the same with the person with the red top and the people are tracked correctly after coming together.
追蹤器也用同樣方式辨識紅色上衣的人，當兩個人又走到一起時仍能正確追蹤。
It doesn’t matter if you work with postal service or automobile manufacturing, whether you produce five units per year or five million.
無論您是郵政服務或汽車製造業、產量是每年五個或五百萬個單位，
It doesn’t matter what type of product or service your company offers.
無論貴公司提供何種類型的產品或服務，
It enables Event scheduling
事件排程
It enables Failover and Failback configuration
具有故障切換和故障回復設置
It enables audio recording on the formats: PCM, G.711, G.726 and AAC.
支援音訊錄製格式：PCM、G.711、G.726 和 AAC
It enables edge recording.
能進行邊緣錄影。
It enables image cropping
能進行影像裁剪
It enables image resizing in the video player
能於影像播放器中調整圖像大小
It enables increasing the frame rate of a given surveillance camera, whenever it is selected
增加選定之監控攝影機的畫面播放速率
It enables increasing the frame rate whenever motion is detected on the images
當偵測到影像上有動作時能增加畫面速率
It enables instant playback of videos from events.
事件影像即時重播
It enables integration with other systems to export recordings.
可整合其它系統以匯出錄影。
It enables integration with other systems to search for "Media Profiles" from Digifort (Recording and Viewing).
可整合其它系統以搜尋 Digifort (錄影和檢視畫面) 之“媒體設定檔”。
It enables integration with other systems to search for live video from any camera.
可整合其它系統以從任何攝影機搜尋即時視訊。
It enables integration with other systems to search recordings from any camera.
可整合其它系統以從任何攝影機搜尋錄影。
It enables live and sectorized audio surveillance.
即時和分段式音訊監控
It enables motion detection processed directly by the cameras
直接由攝影機處理運動偵測
It enables other systems integrated with Digifort to acquire PTZ control of the cameras.
其它系統能與 Digifort 整合以取得攝影機的 PTZ 控制。
It enables other systems through Digifort to acquire PTZ control (Pan, Tilt, Optical zoom) and digital zoom.
其它系統能透過 Digifort 取得 PTZ 控制 (平移、傾斜、光學變焦) 和數位變焦。
It enables other systems to acquire a "Camera Listing".
其它系統能取得“攝影機清單”。
It enables other systems to acquire an "Alarm Device Listing".
其它系統能取得“警報裝置清單”。
It enables other systems via Digifort to activate alarm outputs from alarm devices.
其它系統能透過 Digifort 來啟動警報裝置的警報輸出。
It enables other systems via Digifort to activate alarm outputs from cameras / video servers.
其它系統能透過 Digifort 來啟動攝影機或視訊伺服器的警報輸出。
It enables other systems via Digifort to check the status of I/O ports from alarm devices.
其它系統能透過 Digifort 來檢查警報裝置 I/O 連接埠的狀態。
It enables other systems via Digifort to check the status of I/O ports from cameras / video servers.
其它系統能透過 Digifort 來檢查攝影機或視訊伺服器的 I/O 連接埠的狀態。
It enables other systems via Digifort to work with global events.
其它系統能透過 Digifort 來操作全體事件。
It enables recording of images generated by 360 degree panamorphic lenses.
能錄製由 360 度全景鏡頭所產生之影像
It enables searching the events database
搜尋事件資料庫
It enables selecting unlimited areas sensitive to motion
能無限制選擇動作敏感之區域
It enables sending e-mails via SMTP with SSL authentication
允許透過 SMTP 使用 SSL 驗證發送電子郵件
It enables synchronized video and audio
影像和音訊同步播放
It enables the audio to be continuously transmitted.
能不斷傳送音訊。
It enables the authentication of system users by using biometrics.
能使用生物驗證技術進行系統使用者驗證。
It enables the authorized user to receive all controls for system operation via web
允許授權的使用者透過網路進行所有的系統操作控制
It enables the authorized user to receive all controls for system operation.
允許授權的使用者進行所有系統操作控制。

Over the past several decades, ever-growing demands for – and misuse of – water resources have increased the risks of pollution and severe water stress in many parts of the world.
過去數十年來，水資源需求不斷增長且遭到濫用，因而增加了世界許多地區污染和嚴重的水源壓力的風險。

Over the period 2015-2030, the greenhouse gas emissions SDGs and targets, including an SDG specifically dedicated to water, helped muster political will, trigger public support and mobilize investments between.
於 2015 - 2030 年間，溫室氣體排放永續發展目標 (SDGs) 和包括了專用於水源的永續發展目標等各項目標帶來了更高的政治意願，也帶來了公眾的支持和投資意願。

Over-abstraction is often the result of out-dated models of natural resource use and governance, where the use of resources for economic growth is under-regulated and undertaken without appropriate controls.
對水資源的過度抽取通常是由對自然資源使用的落後管理模式所造成的。 在這種模式下，因謀求經濟增長而對資源使用的監管不力，且缺乏相應控制。

Sustainability in the Asia and the Pacific region is intimately linked with progress in access to safe water and sanitation; meeting water demands across multiple uses and mitigating the concurrent pollution loads; improving groundwater management; and increasing resilience to water-related disasters.
亞太地區的永續性很大程度上取決於能否獲得安全水資源和衛生服務、如何滿足多方面用水需求的同時減輕所帶來的污染負荷、如何改善地下水管理，以及增強對水災的抗災能力等。
Sustainable development and human rights perspectives both call for reductions in inequities and tackling disparities in access to WASH services.
從永續性發展與人權的角度來看，均要求減少並解決在獲取供水、環境與個人衛生（WASH）等方面所存在的不公正待遇以及差異。

Sustainable production and consumption patterns related to water are achieved based on consistent and transparent water accounting systems that quantify water flows in the economy and the environment, providing clear and relevant information about related impacts.
基於一致且透明的水資源統計系統以量化經濟和環境中流動的水資源以提供相關影響的明確和相關資訊，使人類實現了永續性的水資源生產和消費模式。

The Leonardo ETH is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega32U4 (datasheet) and the new W5500 TCP/IP Embedded Ethernet Controller (datasheet). It has 20 digital input/output pins (of which 7 can be used as PWM outputs and 12 as analog inputs), a 16 MHz crystal oscillator, a RJ45 connection, a micro USB connector, a power jack, an ICSP header, and a reset button.
The Leonardo ETH係以ATmega32U4（數據資料表）和新款W5500 TCP/IP嵌入式乙太網路控制器（數據資料表）為基礎架構之微控制器電路板，它具有20組數位輸入/輸出針腳（其中針腳7可作為PWM輸出而針腳12為類比輸入）、 16 MHz晶體振蕩器、RJ45連接口、micro USB連接口、電源接口、ICSP頭座針腳以及重置按鈕。
The Leonardo has 12 analog inputs, labeled A0 through A11, all of which can also be used as digital i/o.

Wastewater from all major human uses is collected and treated to the most appropriate level for reuse or release back to the environment, and maximized reuse is a major contributor to the achievement of universal access to water.
人類使用後的所有主要廢水被收集並適當地處理後以再利用或重新釋放回環境中，而最大化水資源的再利用是實現人人享有水資源的主要方式。

Water and the three dimensions of sustainable development
水資源和永續發展的三個層面
Water demand for everyday domestic uses is met through the use of efficient technologies and effective, equitable tariffs are in place.
藉由高效的技術和有效率、公平的稅制以滿足日常生活用水需求。

Water demand per capita and per unit of productivity is significantly lower than it was in 2015 in the agricultural, industrial and energy sectors, allowing for the resource to be shared more equitably.
人均水資源需求和單位生產力顯著低於 2015 年時農業、工業和能源部門的水準，使人們能要更加平等地共用資源。
Water is a key consideration for all sectors that use it as a resource through production chains, resulting in better supply and demand management.
所有使用水資源在生產鏈中的部門將水視為重要的考量，從而導致更好的供應和需求管理。
Water is an essential resource in the production of most types of goods and services including food, energy and manufacturing.
水是大多數產品包括食物、能源和製造業生產中必要的資源，
Water is at the core of sustainable development.
水是永續發展的核心，
Water is duly valued in all its forms, with wastewater treated as a resource that avails energy, nutrients and freshwater for reuse.
各種形式的水資源都非常寶貴，例如可以有效利用污水資源來再生能源、營養物與可再利用的淡水。

Water is governed in a participatory way that draws on the full potential of women and men as professionals and citizens, guided by a number of able and knowledgeable organizations, within a just and transparent institutional framework.
在一個公平透明的框架體制中，以參與性的方式管理水資源，不僅能充分利用女性與男性專家、公民的潛力，還能得到眾多富有相關能力與知識的組織的引導。
Water management is the responsibility of many different decision-makers in public and private sectors.
水資源管理是很多不同的公共和私營部門決策者們的責任。
Water pricing also provides signals for how to allocate scarce water resources to the highest-value uses – in financial terms or other types of benefits.
水價也為如何分配缺乏的水資源至最具價值（財政或其他利益）的利用提供參考。
Water productivity in both rainfed and irrigated agriculture has increased dramatically, and water use efficiency in agriculture is widespread.
在旱作和灌溉的農業用水生產率已急劇增加，而且農業普遍能高效率的利用水分。
Water resources management, infrastructure and service delivery are sustainably financed.
人類以永續的方式進行水資源管理、基礎設施建設與服務注入資金。
Water resources, and the range of services they provide, underpin poverty reduction, economic growth and environmental sustainability.
水資源與其供給服務是減少貧窮、經濟成長和環境永續性的基石。

Water scarcity stands at the forefront when considering water-related challenges that impede progress towards sustainable development in the Arab region, where unsustainable consumption and over-abstraction of surface and groundwater resources contribute to water shortages and threaten long-term sustainable development.
在所有阻礙阿拉伯地區永續發展與水源相關的挑戰中，水資源短缺為首要問題。此地區中，非永續性的消費和對地表及地下水的過度使用造成了水資源短缺，並且威脅到了長期的永續性發展。
Water supply (quantity and quality) at the place where the user needs it must be reliable and predictable to support financially sustainable investments in economic activities.
在使用者所需之處供水（量和品質）必須是可靠和可預測的，以對經濟活動的投資提供永續性的財務支援。
Water-related disasters, the most economically and socially destructive of all natural hazards, are likely to increase with climate change.
隨著氣候變化，水災——自然災害中最具經濟和社會破壞力的災害類型——很可能會增加。

Weight

Weight Alarm (+): Programming grams of net weight so that when a single sample is above this absolute value, positive weight alarm jumps.
Weight Alarm (+) (正重量警報)：設定淨重之克數，當一個樣品超過此數值，將啟動正重量警報，
Weight Alarm (-): Programming the lower level in grams of net weight that triggers an alarm, when the weight individual sample is below this value.
Weight Alarm (-) (負重量警報)：淨重低於設定之克數，當個別樣品之重量低於此數值將啟動此警報，

Weight Shutter:Force transducer which after having taken into account the effects of acceleration of gravity and air buoyancy at the place of use, measures a mass converting the measured magnitude (mass) into another measured magnitude (output = electrical signal).
秤重門 (Weight Shutter)：考慮使用地點之重力加速度和空氣浮力之力傳感器，將量測值 (質量)轉換為其它量測訊號 (輸出 = 電力訊號)。

Workers are wearing closed toe shoes.
勞工都穿著包覆腳趾的鞋子。
Workers handling hot frames or racking systems are wearing heat-resistant gloves.
勞工處理高溫框架或貨架系統時穿戴耐熱手套。
Workers handling hot molds are wearing heat-resistant gloves.
勞工處理高溫模具時穿戴耐熱手套。
Workers handling pieces wet with dip tank liquids are wearing chemical resistant gloves and aprons.
勞工處理帶有浸漬槽液體之工件時穿戴抗化學腐蝕手套和圍裙。
Workers handling pieces wet with quench tank liquids are wearing chemical resistant gloves and aprons.
勞工處理帶有淬火槽液體之工件時穿戴抗化學腐蝕手套和圍裙。
Workers potentially exposed to contact with metal working fluids are wearing chemical resistant gloves.
勞工可能接觸金屬加工液時配戴抗化學腐蝕手套。
Workers potentially exposed to flying metal, grinding fragments or other metal debris are wearing safety glasses with side shields.
勞工暴露於金屬、研磨碎片或其他金屬碎片可能飛濺的環境中應配戴具有側面防護之安全眼鏡。
Workers potentially exposed to splashed dip tank liquid are wearing a face shield and safety goggles.
勞工暴露於浸漬槽可能噴濺之液體時配戴面罩和安全護目鏡。
Workers potentially exposed to splashed quench tank liquid are wearing a face shield and safety goggles.
勞工暴露於淬火槽可能噴濺之液體時配戴面罩和安全護目鏡。
Workers potentially exposed to uncured resins are wearing safety goggles.
勞工可能暴露於未乾燥硬化之樹脂時配戴安全護目鏡。
Workers use protective face shields or goggles fitted with filtering lenses to eliminate UV flash exposure.
勞工人使用裝有過濾鏡片之防護面罩或護目鏡來消除紫外線閃光的暴露量。
Workers with potential skin exposure to uncured resins are wearing chemical resistant gloves.
勞工皮膚可能接觸未乾燥硬化之樹脂時配戴抗化學腐蝕手套。
Workers working in areas where the floor is wet with dip tank liquids are wearing chemical resistant and slip free boots.
勞工之工作區域地板潮濕帶有浸漬槽之液體時穿戴抗化學腐蝕以及防滑工作靴。
Workers working in areas where the floor is wet with quench tank liquids are wearing chemical resistant and slip free boots.
勞工之工作區域地板潮濕帶有淬火槽之液體時穿戴抗化學腐蝕以及防滑工作靴。

� Before use in water, be sure to read the �Detailed User Guide� in the built-in memory of the camcorder.

� Close the connector cover firmly until it clicks and confirm that the red sign completely goes off.
•緊密蓋上連接孔蓋直到發出“咖”一聲，確認紅色指示燈完全熄滅。
� Do not apply impact in water.
•請勿於水中受到衝擊。
� Do not soak the camcorder in hot springs or water of 40�C or higher.

� Dustproof function is not meant to encourage use on sand.
•防塵功能不代表建議於沙塵中使用。

� Temperatures between 0�C and -10�C temporarily lower battery performance, reducing the time available for recording.

� The waterproof cannot be guaranteed if the camcorder is subject to impact such as dropping.

� Use the camcorder in marine water and fresh water not deeper than 5m and for not more than 30 minutes.
